timeline.message: Allow to completely omit the stacktrace subtree deduplication
Allow temporarily adjust sampler period via a system property
Allow passing in a processor closure instead of passing over an IMLTChunk instance
Improve allocation behaviour by pooling ByteBuffer at thread level

timeline.body: I suspect this branch will probably lead to much better compression opportunities than the other.
timeline.bodyText: I suspect this branch will probably lead to much better compression opportunities than the other.
timeline.bodyHTML: I suspect this branch will probably lead to much better compression opportunities than the other.
timeline.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: Yep. The former one will be probably removed - does not seem to bring much benefit in real life.
replies.author: jbachorik

timeline.bodyHTML:
if ((topItem & 0x80000000) == 0x80000000

->

if (topItem < 0)

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
long samplerPeriod = Long.parseLong(System.getProperty("mlt.sampler.ms", "10"));
long samplerPeriod = Long.getLong("mlt.sampler.ms", 10);
timeline.author: jpbempel

timeline.body:
MLTReader class does not have any fields so we may make all methods static.

usually when you are doing something like:
``` new MyClass().aMethod() ```
you can transform your method as a static one as don't have to store any fields inside the object
timeline.bodyText:
